title: Coronavirus: Nigerian actress Funke Akindele under fire for Lagos party amid lockdown
description: Funke Akindele has been sharply criticised on social media for celebrating with friends.
content:
Image copyright JJC Skillz/ TwitterImage caption
 Funke Akindele is one of Nigeria's best known actresses
Prominent Nigerian actress Funke Akindele has been widely criticised for holding a party during the lockdown imposed to tackle coronavirus.
